00030 /* Creation flags. */
00031 #define T_FPU     XNFPU
00032 #define T_SUSP    XNSUSP
00033 /* <!> High bits must not conflict with XNFPU|XNSHADOW|XNSHIELD|XNSUSP. */
00034 #define T_CPU(cpu) (1 << (24 + (cpu & 7))) /* Up to 8 cpus [0-7] */
00035 #define T_CPUMASK  0xff000000
00036

00168 static inline RT_TASK *thread2rtask (xnthread_t *t)
00169 {
00170     return t ? ((RT_TASK *)(((char *)(t)) - (int)(&((RT_TASK *)0)->thread_base))) : NULL;
00171 }

00300 static inline int rt_task_spawn(RT_TASK *task,
00301                                 const char *name,
00302                                 int stksize,
00303                                 int prio,
00304                                 int mode,
00305                                 void (*entry)(void *cookie),
00306                                 void *cookie)
00307 {
00308     int err = rt_task_create(task,name,stksize,prio,mode);
00309 
00310     if (!err)
00311         err = rt_task_start(task,entry,cookie);
00312 
00313     return err;
00314 }
